group.name: Plugin Commands: End Device Support
group.description: The End Device Support plugin contributes commands for controlling the sleeping and polling behavior of the device.

command.description: Display the status of the End Device's polling and sleeping.
Sets whether the CLI forces the device to stay awake.

arg.name: stayAwake
arg.description: The value indicating whether the device should stay awake.

command.description: Sets whether the device stays awake when not joined to a ZigBee network.

arg.name: stayAwakeWhenNotJoined
arg.description: The value indicating whether the device should stay awake when not joined to a ZigBee network.

command.description: Sets whether the device's poll completed callback function is enabled.

arg.name: pollCompletedCallbackCommand
arg.description: The value indicating whether the device's poll completed callback function is enabled.
